org.apache.wml

Interface WMLInputElement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.w3c.dom.Element, org.w3c.dom.Node, WMLElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WMLInputElementImpl

    public interface WMLInputElement
extends WMLElement

    The interface is modeled after DOM1 Spec for HTML from W3C. The DTD used in this DOM model is from http://www.wapforum.org/DTD/wml_1.1.xml

    'input' element specifies a text entry object. (Section 11.6.3, WAP WML Version 16-Jun-1999)

    Version:
    $Id: WMLInputElement.java 447258 2006-09-18 05:41:23Z mrglavas $
    Author:
    David Li

        void setType(java.lang.String newValue)
